subject: How to delete an object in the test fixture?
msgSnippet: in JUnit, I understand how setup and teardown work for each test method. I want to delete an object in the test fixture in my teardown method. This object is a
messageBody:
in JUnit, I understand how setup and teardown work for each test method.

I want to delete an object in the test fixture in my teardown method.
This object is a singleton that needs to be created at the beginning of each test.

How do I do this in JUnit?

Thanks for your help.

lee
